song.title: Es Hilft
song.info:
English Translation:
it doesn't help to talk about it it doesn't help to be sorry all those sorrows do not help it doesn't help to not cheer up
it doesn't help to achieve something it doesn't help, even if one's right it doesn't help to be like others and if it helps, it helps poorly
ref. and when the press writes and writes how everything vanishes/works and everything remains a generalisation doesn't help only my gentle sweetheart helps and whatever television tells how one feels, so one votes/chooses a generalisation doesn't help only my gentle sweetheart helps
it doesn't help to think of oneself it doesn't help to screw with oneself it doesn't help to give oneself away it turns out different than one believes
it doesn't help to understand it there is no difference it doesn't help, because it doesn't work like that even this song doesn't help
